text: Aur jo log apnay rab say dartay thay unn kay giroh kay giroh jannat ki taraf rawana kiyey jayen gay yahan tak kay jab uss kay pass aajayen gay aur darwazay khol diyey jayen gay aur wahan kay nigehbaan unn say kahen gay tum per salam ho tum khushaal raho tum iss mein hamesha kay liye chalay jao
